question: Fa-Hien who came to visit India during Gupta Period had the main motive of ___________?
option1: Establish trade relations between India and China
option2: Write a book on the life of Indian People
option3: Study the teachings of Gautam Buddha
answer: Study the teachings of Gautam Buddha
explanation: Fa-Hien was a Chinese Buddhist, was one of the pilgrims who visited India during the reign of the Gupta emperor Chandragupta II. His main motive is to study the teachings of Gautama Buddha.
